revised_title: Auzout's Observations on Telescope Apertures and Proportions
tldr: Monsieur Auzout discusses his observations on the relationship between aperture size and telescope length. He notes that larger aperture lenses are not necessarily better and that the aperture size should be proportional to the length of the telescope. Auzout plans to provide a detailed explanation and demonstration in his upcoming work, Diopticks.
